Information.Name: dropdown_menu
Information.Containers: htmlcontainer, dialog, dialog_2, dialog_3, container, tablecell, form, vdomclass, smartfolderdata, flexcontainer

Language.Sentence: The List type produces an object displayed as a horizontal or vertical list.
The necessary CSS code applied to all objects within the container.
The order of rendering the object on the page. The objects with identical values of the Hierarchy attribute are rendered in the order they are written in the XML-file of the VDOM application.
Spacing between the object and the top border of the container, in which the object is situated.
Spacing between the object and the left border of the container, in which the object is situated.
The data in JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) format.
The CSS style of the object. If the user changes CSS style, the Skin attribute is changed to the 'User defined'.

The position in visual hierarchy of objects. If you have several objects in one container situated on each other, the value of 'Z-Index' attribute indicates the order of their displaying. The larger the value is, the upper the object is situated.
The visibility of the object. In any case the object will exist on the web page, this attribute only makes it invisible.
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds
Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds
Used to insert horizontal or vertical list
Order of rendering the object on the page
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object in pixels
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object in pixels
Width of the object in pixels
Height of the object in pixels
Position in visual hierarchy of objects

Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer

Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99

Используется для добавления горизонтальных или вертикальных списков
Порядок визуализации объекта в ходе загрузки страницы
Расстояние от верхней границы родительского контейнера до объекта в пикселях
Расстояние от левой границы родительского контейнера до объекта в пикселях
